file.name: /vagrant/project/foobar-trade-processor/lib/Controller.php
file.violation: The method factory uses an else expression. Else is never necessary and you can simplify the code to work without else.

file.name: /vagrant/project/foobar-trade-processor/lib/Router.php

file.name: /vagrant/project/foobar-trade-processor/lib/View.php
file.violation: Avoid unused local variables such as '$data'.
